# Waratchaō yo Boyfriend

|header=Music videos|type=single}}
|header=no|type=single}}
}}
is the 11th single of the all-girl J-pop group Berryz Kobo, released on August 2, 2006.
The single ranked 15th in the Oricon Weekly Singles Chart.
Details
* Main vocalist: Momoko Tsugunaga, Miyabi Natsuyaki
* Minor Vocalist: Risako Sugaya
* Center: Risako Sugaya, Yurina Kumai and Chinami Tokunaga
